mapper.update: update order_info set o_type = #{oType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_contacts = #{oContacts,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_start_date = #{oStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_end_date = #{oEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, o_price = #{oPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, o_shipping_address = #{oShippingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_receiving_address = #{oReceivingAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_id = #{sId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, d_id = #{dId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, o_state = #{oState,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, o_remarks = #{oRemarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select o_id, o_type, o_contacts, o_start_date, o_end_date, o_price, o_shipping_address, o_receiving_address, s_id, d_id, o_state, o_remarks from order_info where o_id = #{oId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select o_id, o_type, o_contacts, o_start_date, o_end_date, o_price, o_shipping_address, o_receiving_address, s_id, d_id, o_state, o_remarks from order_info
